metadata.feature_description: Provides DNN portal roles for URL path authentication configuration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all roles for current portal

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Crawling tab should display URL Paths section
steps.actual: Crawling tab displayed with URL Paths section showing existing URL configurations

steps.action: Clicked 'Add Url' button to open URL path configuration form
steps.expected: Add URL form should open with DNN Role Impersonation dropdown
steps.actual: Add URL form opened with DNN Role Impersonation dropdown showing '-- Select --'

steps.action: Clicked on the DNN Role Impersonation dropdown
steps.expected: Dropdown should display list of all portal roles
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed all portal roles including: Administrators, Community Manager, Content Editors, Content Managers, Moderators, Registered Users, Subscribers, Test Custom Role, Translator (en-US), Unverified Users, Wiki Test Group

steps.action: Selected 'Content Editors' role from the dropdown
steps.expected: Role should be selected and displayed in the dropdown
steps.actual: Content Editors role was selected and displayed in the DNN Role Impersonation dropdown

observations: The GetDnnPortalRoles API endpoint successfully retrieves all roles for the current portal
Both system roles (Administrators, Registered Users, Unverified Users) and custom roles (Test Custom Role, Wiki Test Group) are included in the retrieval
The role dropdown includes translator roles (Translator (en-US)) which are auto-created for language support
The feature is used specifically in the URL Paths configuration within the Search Crawling settings for DNN Role Impersonation
